body_html:
CUDA 8 probably doesn't work with gcc 6: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43685471/is-cuda-8-0-now-compatible-with-gcc-5-4

Here's a matrix of gcc version and Ubuntu version that work with CUDA 9.1: http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements

Your ubuntu version might be too new/not a LTS to be well supported

body:
CUDA 8 probably doesn't work with gcc 6: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43685471/is-cuda-8-0-now-compatible-with-gcc-5-4

Here's a matrix of gcc version and Ubuntu version that work with CUDA 9.1: http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-linux/index.html#system-requirements

Your ubuntu version might be too new/not a LTS to be well supported
